description: Featuring a soft, stretchable, sweater-knit fabric with superior breathability and moisture management, the KÜHL Men’s ALLOY™ CrewSweater is ideal for layering or can stand alone for a stylish, athletic look. Our articulated design along with built-in stretch delivers superior flexibility with the ideal fit. Sun protection (UPF 15+).
name: Kuhl Alloy Crew - Mens
